name: Google Ponies
description:
Version 1.74

Replace your Google logo with ponies from MLP! :D

I'm releasing this with a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike license. Feel free to do what you like with it, as long as you are not making money off of this and you give proper attribution to the creator of the style (netMASA) and the image (happydragon101 on DeviantArt)

user.name: netMASA
user.about:
You may know me as either MASA, netMASA, RogueDarkJedi or RainbowDashJedi.

I make stuff. I like ponies. Sup.

additional_info:
Image by happydragon101 (http://happydragon101.deviantart.com/art/Google-is-Magic-VECTOR-215018443)

Google Ponies on the Chrome Webstore: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/mmackoaegeibgaaalhlkoolbfieijknh

Google Ponies on Mozilla Addons: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/google-ponies/

Changelog:
-------------------------
* Version 1.1: Added support for Google Encrypted.

* Version 1.2: Fixed Google Groups issue.

* Version 1.3: Added support for the new Google style

* Version 1.4: Fixed the logo not displaying on the new personalized Google search layout

* Version 1.5: Fixed logo sizing, and fixed the unclickable gmail buttons in Chrome.

* Version 1.6: Cleaned up the CSS, removed old rule sets that Google doesn't use anymore.

* Version 1.7: added more google domains

* Version 1.71: added google.ar

* Version 1.72: added google.sg, google.co.cr

* Version 1.73: fixed incorrect urls and added a whole bunch more.

* Version 1.74: fixed spacing issues.

Notes:
-------------------------
To clear up any confusion: I'm not trying to make money off of this, I added the donation option to my account for my other styles, but userstyles has decided to place it on all my style pages. Please disregard the donation button on this page as it would be unfair to the artist of the logo. Thank you.

discussions.name: Get it back on google webstore
